parameters:
Hey, Aisha-chan, you're keeping everyone waiting, you know?
Hurry up and go.
\SE[0]Good work today. How was your new job?
スライドスピード = def

I was in great shape. The quota is a bit high, but the pay
is good. I might be able to treat you guys to some luxuries.

You received half of the advance payment, right? Shall we
splurge on something right away? Vita, have you thought of
something you want?

\SE[3]Hmm... \SE[6]I haven't decided yet. \SE[1]If I had to
say... maybe a trip after all.

\SE[4]I heard that 'Yuriseen' has even more delicious
fish... I might want to try eating there.

Well then, we'll have to put the reward on hold until you
finish work, right? Come on, you. Work hard and give it your
all, okay?
スライドスピード = def
Oh! I work like a workhorse...!!

When I was born, it was a doll that my father bought. Even
though it got damaged, he repaired it many times... we've
always been together.
